<rule id="java-removals-00030" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <javaclass references="javax.security.auth.Policy"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="3" title="The `javax.security.auth.Policy` class has been removed">
                    <message>
                        <![CDATA[
                        The `javax.security.auth.Policy` class has been removed.
                        It should be replaced by the use of `java.security.Policy` and `java.security.ProtectionDomain`.
                        Usage of `policy.getPermissions(subject,codeSource)` should be  replaced with a call to
                        policy.getPermissions passing in a new ProtectionDomain (see links below for details)
                        ]]>
                    </message>
                    <link href="https://docs.oracle.com/javase/10/docs/api/javax/security/auth/Policy.html" title="Java 10 javax.security.auth.Policy api"/>
                    <link href="https://docs.oracle.com/en/java/javase/11/docs/api/java.base/java/security/Policy.html" title="Java 11 java.security.Policy api"/>
                </hint>
            </perform>
        </rule>
